thread.title: Feds: 'Dance Moms' star hid show income during bankruptcy
thread.title_full: Feds: 'Dance Moms' star hid show income during bankruptcy

title: Feds: 'Dance Moms' star hid show income during bankruptcy
text: > Entertainment Feds: 'Dance Moms' star hid show income during bankruptcy FILE - In this May 13, 2015 file photo, Abby Lee Miller arrives at the 3rd Annual Reality TV Awards in Los Angeles. Miller has been charged with hiding $775,000 worth of income from the Lifetime network reality show and spin-off projects during her Chapter 11 bankruptcy. Federal prosecutors in Pittsburgh announced the bankruptcy fraud indictment Tuesday, Oct. 13, against 50-year-old Abigale Lee Miller, formerly of Penn Hills. (Photo by Rich Fury/Invision/AP, File)
